amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 114 of the bill which discontinues the mandatory 10 percent set-aside from the surface transportation program for the transportation enhancement program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 114 from the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Petri amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 327 - 90 (Roll no. 469).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Petri.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
